treeSSLangDefition.description: Psuedo-function that allows to select nodes and branches on a whole level of the tree. The parameter specifies the number of levels above that level. Counting starts at the root. (The parameter can also be seen as the index of the level to be selected where the first level (the root) has the index 0.)

example.description: Selects all branches leading to nodes on the third level of the tree (above are only the root (level 0) it ist direct children (level 1)) and sets their color to green.
